issue.title: [CI] Environment variables are defined twice for the fuzzit builds
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7355](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7355). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
https://github.com/apache/arrow/commit/7102d7eeef60fd0fb4fb7b06ed092d63db961b15#diff-4e5e90c6228fd48698d074241c2ba760R916 broke the fuzzit builds

The environment variables should be merged.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7355?focusedCommentId=16991966) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
